original_text: And is there any man who has planted a vineyard and has not enjoyed its fruit? Let him go back to his house, lest he die in the battle and another man enjoy its fruit.
korean_text: 포도원을 만들고 그 과실을 먹지 못한 자가 있느냐 그는 집으로 돌아갈지니 전사하면 타인이 그 과실을 먹을까 하노라

sentences.original_text: And is there any man who has planted a vineyard
and has not enjoyed its fruit?
Let him go back to his house,
lest he die in the battle
and another man enjoy its fruit.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람이 그 열매를 누리게 되리라.
